name: fix-your-indent
title: Fix Your Indent
description: Removes unnecessary leading whitespaces from text when you want to paste code into your web browser
author: csharp

commands.name: index
commands.title: Remove Unnecessary Leading Whitespaces
commands.description: Removes unnecessary leading whitespaces from text when you want to paste code into your web browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
